title: Opr. Management Planning
description: Unless you're side-gigging for the fun of it, you must ensure that the payment you get from your effort is commensurate to the effort you put into the project.If not at first, there should at least be a potential of earning more than the effort put into the work.

title: Strategic Planning
description: For instance, a ventriloquist doesn't need a certification to begin entertaining people. You don't need a degree to walk a dog either. But graphics designers, Excel experts, or technical writers might need certification and a portfolio to begin the hustle.

title: 5 killer tips for your CV
description: Unless you're side-gigging for the fun of it, you must ensure that the payment you get from your effort is commensurate to the effort you put into the project.If not at first, there should at least be a potential of earning more than the effort put into the work.
